question: In a black hole________?
option1: All wavelengths of light are absorbed
option2: All wavelengths of light are absorbed except green and blue
option3: All wavelengths of light are absorbed except blue and red
option4: All wavelengths of light are absorbed except red & green
answer: All wavelengths of light are absorbed
explanation: A black hole is a place in space where everything is pulled in and even light can not get out. The gravity is so strong because matter has been squeezed into a tiny space. This can happen when a star is dying. As light can get out, people can't see black holes.
